languages.text: {n}Астропат молчит несколько секунд, опустив лицо к полу. Его руки дрожат.{/n} "Вы правы. Я не снимаю с себя вины. И да постигнет меня кара Его, если я забуду о ней хоть на мгновение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Астсропат молчит несколько секунд, опустив взор лицо к полу. Его руки под рясой начинают заметно дрожать. {/n} "Вы правы, Ваша Светлость. Я не снимаю с себя участие в этом преступлении. Моя действительность с тех самых пор — мой личный нескончаемый ад, и да постигнет меня кара Его, если я забуду об этом хоть на мгновение".

languages.text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."
languages.original_text: {n}Астропат молчит несколько секунд, опустив лицо к полу. Его руки дрожат.{/n} "Вы правы. Я не снимаю с себя вины. И да постигнет меня кара Его, если я забуду о ней хоть на мгновение".

{n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

languages.text: {n}Weisz guarda silencio durante unos segundos, con la mirada fija en el suelo y las manos temblorosas.{/n} «Tiene razón. No intento absolverme de mi parte de culpa. Y que Su castigo me alcance de olvidarla durante un segundo».
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz guarda silencio durante unos segundos, con la mirada fija en el suelo y las manos temblorosas.{/n} «Tiene razón. No intento absolverme de mi parte de culpa. Y que Su castigo me alcance de olvidarla durante un segundo».

languages.text: {n}ワイズは数秒間押し黙り、顔を下に伏せ、両手を震わせていた。{/n}「あなたの言う通りだ。自分の罪から逃れることはできない。そして一瞬でもそのことを忘れたら、主の罰が下るのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズは数秒間押し黙り、顔を下に伏せ、両手を震わせていた。{/n}「あなたの言う通りだ。自分の罪から逃れることはできない。そして一瞬でもそのことを忘れたら、主の罰が下るのだ」

languages.text: {n}威茨沉默许久，盯着地板，双手颤抖着。{/n}“您说得对，我不能就这么忽视我自己的罪过。若是我忘记了这件事情，哪怕仅仅忘记片刻，那我也愿神皇惩罚我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨沉默许久，盯着地板，双手颤抖着。{/n}“您说得对，我不能就这么忽视我自己的罪过。若是我忘记了这件事情，哪怕仅仅忘记片刻，那我也愿神皇惩罚我。”

languages.text: {n}Weisz schweigt einige Sekunden lang, das Gesicht zum Boden gesenkt, die Hände zittrig.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich erteile mir keine Absolution von meiner eigenen Schuld. Und möge seine Strafe mich treffen, wenn ich sie auch nur einen Augenblick lang vergesse."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz schweigt einige Sekunden lang, das Gesicht zum Boden gesenkt, die Hände zittrig.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich erteile mir keine Absolution von meiner eigenen Schuld. Und möge seine Strafe mich treffen, wenn ich sie auch nur einen Augenblick lang vergesse."

languages.text: {n}Le regard rivé au sol et les mains tremblantes, Weisz garde le silence l'espace de quelques instants.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Loin de moi l'idée de nier ma propre culpabilité. Puisse Son châtiment s'abattre sur moi dans l'instant si jamais je venais à l'oublier ne serait-ce qu'une seule seconde. »
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard rivé au sol et les mains tremblantes, Weisz garde le silence l'espace de quelques instants.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Loin de moi l'idée de nier ma propre culpabilité. Puisse Son châtiment s'abattre sur moi dans l'instant si jamais je venais à l'oublier ne serait-ce qu'une seule seconde. »

languages.text: {n}Weisz, birkaç saniye sessiz kalıyor. Yüzünü yere dönüyor, elleri titriyor.{/n} "Haklısınız. Suçluluğumdan dolayı kendimi affetmiyorum. Bu felaketi bir an bile unutursam O'nun ellerinden cezamı bulayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz is silent for a few seconds, his face lowered toward the floor, his hands trembling.{/n} "You are right. I do not absolve myself of my own guilt. And may His punishment strike me if I forget about it for even a moment."
